title: Brennan Pinot Noir
description: Brennan Pinot Noir is a New Zealand wine from Central Otago, characterized by red and dark fruit notes like cherry and blackberry, often with herbal and spicy undertones of rosemary, clove, and tobacco. It is described as having a refined, fresh, and silky texture with a balance of acidity and fine, elegant tannins, making it a versatile food wine that pairs well with lamb, duck, or charcuterie.
taste: oak, chocolate, tabacco, earthy, mushroom, smoke, plum, blackberry, cherry, pepper

title:
Long Barn
Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A fruit-forward and accessible Cabernet Sauvignon from California. It presents ripe aromas of blackberry, dark cherry, and plum with subtle hints of vanilla and spice from oak aging. The palate is medium-bodied with smooth tannins and a clean finish, making it an excellent everyday wine that offers great value.
taste: oak,vanilla, cherry, chocolate, pepper, blackberry, strawberry, leather

title: Roche Mazet, Chardonnay
description: A popular Chardonnay from the Pays d'Oc region in the South of France, known for its consistent quality and value. This wine emphasizes fresh fruit flavors, displaying notes of green apple, pear, and citrus with hints of tropical fruit and white flowers. The palate is crisp and refreshing with a balanced finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, butter, pear, green apple, apple, citrus, lime, lemon, honey, smoke, almond, cream, banana, pineapple, tropical

title: Eight Years in the Desert
description: A bold and complex Zinfandel-based blend from cult winemaker Dave Phinney. It unleashes a powerful bouquet of ripe blackberry, raspberry jam, and dark cherry, layered with notes of black pepper, licorice, and sweet oak. The palate is full-bodied, opulent, and velvety, with a long, lingering finish.
taste: blackberry, oak, vanilla, blueberry, plum, chocolate, cherry, tobacco, dark fruit, black fruit, black cherry, jam, dark chocolate, red fruit, raspberry, leather, smoke, earthy, blackcurrant, cassis, fig, cream

title: Toscana Torrione
description: Torrione is the flagship 'Super Tuscan' from Petrolo, made primarily from Sangiovese. The 2014 vintage offers a mature and elegant profile, with aromas of dried cherry, plum, leather, and tobacco, alongside earthy and balsamic notes. The palate is medium to full-bodied with well-integrated tannins and a long, savory finish.
taste: oak, cherry, leather, tobacco, earthy, red fruit, plum, vanilla,

title: Domaine Bernard Prudhon Saint-Aubin 1er Cru Les Castets
description: A Premier Cru white Burgundy from the respected Saint-Aubin appellation. This Chardonnay is elegant and complex, offering aromas of ripe pear, green apple, and citrus, with notes of toasted almond, vanilla, and a distinct flinty minerality. The palate is well-structured with a creamy texture balanced by vibrant acidity.
taste: oak, honey, minerals, butter, pineapple, tropical, lemon, saline, lemon peel, citrus, apple, peach, acacia, orange blossom, prune, raspberry, toast

title: Le C De Calon Ségur
variety: Blend (Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Petit Verdot)
description: The third wine of the famed Saint-Estèphe estate, Château Calon-Ségur. Crafted to be enjoyed earlier, it offers a glimpse into the estate's terroir. It's a classic Bordeaux blend with notes of blackcurrant, cherry, and cedar, with hints of earth and spice. The palate is medium-bodied with smooth tannins and a fresh, balanced finish.
taste: cedar, vanilla, oak, pepper

title: Château Le Reysse
description: A Cru Bourgeois from the Médoc, this wine from the 2010 vintage is now fully mature. A blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, it displays complex, developed aromas of dried black fruits, cassis, tobacco leaf, and forest floor. The palate is medium-bodied with resolved, supple tannins and a savory, lingering finish.
taste: leather, oak, cassis, tobacco, plum, stone, graphite, cherry,

title: Brunel de La Gardine
description: From a well-known Châteauneuf-du-Pape producer, this is their accessible Côtes-du-Rhône. A classic Southern Rhône blend of Grenache, Syrah, and Mourvèdre, it features aromas of ripe raspberry, black cherry, and licorice, with a touch of pepper. The palate is medium to full-bodied with smooth tannins and a generous, warming finish.
taste: plum, cherry, eathy, blackberry, leather, pepper, balck fruit, strawberry, raspberry, vanilla, oak, cheese

title: Innisfree Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Crafted by the team behind the iconic Joseph Phelps Insignia, this wine is made with the same meticulous care. It offers inviting aromas of black cherry, blackberry, and cassis, complemented by notes of vanilla, spice, and a hint of mocha. The palate is full-bodied and well-structured with velvety tannins and a long, satisfying finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, blackberry, plum, cherry, chocolate, leather, pepper, cheese, violet

title: Frank Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon
description: The 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon is gracious and medium in body, with good energy and fine balance, especially for an appellation-level wine. Sweet red cherry and floral notes are nicely lifted in this mid-weight, open-knit Cabernet.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, tobacco, leather, earthy, blackberry, plum, black cherry, cassis, cherry, raspberry, pepper

title:
Domaine Vincent Latour
Volnay 'Cuvée Nathan'
description: A village-level Volnay known for its elegance. This Pinot Noir expresses delicate red fruit (red cherry, raspberry), earthy notes (forest floor, mushroom), and subtle hints of spice from oak aging. The palate is silky and refined with fine-grained tannins and a persistent, mineral-driven finish, embodying the classic finesse of the Volnay appellation.
taste: red cherry, red fruit, cherry, eathy, forest floor, leather, mushroom, blueberry, boysenberry, fennel, nectarine

title:
Tommasi
I Pianeti Valpolicella
description: This wine is a quintessential expression of Valpolicella Classico from the renowned Tommasi family. Crafted from a traditional blend, it is designed to be fresh and approachable. The wine opens with a vibrant bouquet of fresh red fruits, showcasing prominent notes of cherry, raspberry, and strawberry, complemented by subtle hints of spice like licorice and cinnamon.
taste: red fruit, strawberry, bing cherry, cherry, red cherry, licorice, cinnamon, black cherry, plum, iron, lemon peel,

title:
Clos du Val 
Red Blend
description: A Napa Valley blend aiming for approachability and fruit-forward character. It is a vibrant and juicy wine, leading with aromas of ripe red fruits like cherry, raspberry, and strawberry. The palate is smooth and medium-bodied with soft tannins, making it an easy-drinking wine that captures the generous fruit character of Napa Valley in an accessible style.
taste: cherry, raspberry, strawberry

title:
La Spinetta
Langhe Nebbiolo
description: La Spinetta's Langhe Nebbiolo is designed as an approachable introduction to the noble grape. It offers classic aromas of cherry, raspberry, and rose petals, with underlying notes of tar and earth. The palate is medium-bodied with the grape's signature firm tannins and bright acidity, leading to a long and savory finish that can be enjoyed in its youth.
taste: cherry, red fruit, raspberry, strawberry, oak, tobacco, vanilla, leather, earthy, tar, plum, blackcurrant, blackberry, pepper, licorice, violet, dried fruit, cheese, tomato, orange

title: Beaujolais-Villages Nouveau
description: Released just weeks after harvest, this wine celebrates the new vintage. Made from Gamay using carbonic maceration, it is exceptionally fresh and fruity. It bursts with exuberant aromas of ripe strawberry, raspberry, and cherry, famously accompanied by notes of banana. The palate is light and juicy with virtually no tannins, meant to be drunk young and chilled.
taste: strawberry, cherry, raspberry, banana, cream, plum, violet

title: Produttori del Barbaresco
description: This is the benchmark Barbaresco from the famed cooperative, made from 100% Nebbiolo. The 2018 vintage offers classic aromas of red cherry, rose petals, and licorice, with developing notes of leather, tar, and tobacco. The palate is elegant yet powerful, with firm tannins and high acidity, showcasing the grace and complexity of the Barbaresco terroir.
taste: cherry, red fruit, strawberry, raspberry, leather, earthy, tar, tobacco, oak, vanilla, licorice, black cherry, violet, raisin, orange

title: Domaine du Bouchot Pouilly-Fumé Caillottes
description: Caillottes' refers to the stony, limestone-rich soils this Sauvignon Blanc is grown on, which imparts a distinct minerality. It presents a precise bouquet of citrus fruits, green apple, and gooseberry, with the appellation's signature notes of flint and gun smoke. The palate is crisp and dry, with a zesty acidity and a long, stony finish.
taste: pear, green apple, citrus, lemon, stone, gooseberry, cream

title: Franceschi Brunello di Montalcino Il Poggione
description: A classic Brunello di Montalcino from a warm vintage. Made from 100% Sangiovese, it reveals a complex nose of ripe red and black cherries, plum, leather, and tobacco, with hints of licorice and balsamic. The palate is full-bodied, powerful, and well-structured with firm, mature tannins and a long, savory finish.
taste: tobacco, oak, vanilla, leather, earthy, smoke, cherry, red fruit, red cherry, plum, black cherry, black berry, licorice, prune, violet

title: Connétable Talbot Saint-Julien
description: As the second wine of Château Talbot, this offers a classic Saint-Julien experience. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, it displays aromas of blackcurrant and blackberry with notes of tobacco and earth. The palate is medium to full-bodied with well-integrated tannins, making it more approachable in its youth than the Grand Vin.
taste: blackcurrant, blackberry, oak, vanilla, tobacco, leather, earthy, cherry, raspberry, pepper, violet,

title: Héritages Vieilles Vignes Côtes du Rhône
description: Sourced from old vines ('Vieilles Vignes'), this wine offers greater concentration. A classic blend of Grenache, Syrah, and Mourvèdre, it is rich with flavors of dark fruits like blackberry and plum, layered with notes of black pepper, garrigue (wild herbs), and a hint of leather. The palate is full-bodied and robust with ripe tannins.
taste: black fruit, blackberry, earthy, leather, oak, pepper, cherry, cheese

title: Domaine Yvon & Laurent Vooc Chablis Vieilles Vignes
description: This 'Vieilles Vignes' (old vines) Chablis delivers enhanced depth and concentration. It showcases the classic Chablis profile of green apple, lemon, and a pronounced minerality reminiscent of crushed oyster shells and flint. The old vines contribute a richer texture and greater complexity, leading to a long and precise finish.
taste: butter, oak, vanilla, caramel, pineapple, tropical, apple, green apple, melon, peach, minerals,

title: Le Petit Clos APALTA
description: The second wine of the iconic Clos Apalta, this Carménère-dominant blend is sourced from the same exceptional terroir. It offers a rich and complex profile of ripe blackberry and plum, woven with notes of cedar, tobacco, chocolate, and a hint of bell pepper. The palate is full-bodied and opulent with velvety tannins and a persistent finish.

title: Joseph Faiveley Bourgogne Pinot Noir 'F. de Faiveley'
description: A regional Bourgogne from a respected producer, this Pinot Noir is crafted for accessibility and charm. It features a lovely bouquet of fresh red fruits like strawberry, cherry, and raspberry, with subtle earthy undertones. On the palate, it is light to medium-bodied with silky tannins, bright acidity, and a clean, elegant finish.

title: Remelluri Rioja Reserva
description: From a single-estate winery, this Reserva is a benchmark for traditional, terroir-driven Rioja. The 2013 vintage shows developed, complex aromas of dried cherry, plum, leather, tobacco, and balsamic notes. The palate is medium-bodied and elegant, with beautifully resolved tannins, savory depth, and a long, mineral-inflected finish.

description: A benchmark Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine is luxurious and complex. It offers alluring aromas of ripe blackberry, cassis, and plum, interwoven with notes of vanilla, tobacco, and cocoa from French oak aging. The palate is full-bodied, rich, and layered, with plush, velvety tannins and a long, elegant finish.

variety: Blend(Shiraz/Syrah, Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec, Petit Verdot)
description: The flagship wine from this Mendoza estate. A Malbec-dominant blend, the mature 2010 vintage reveals a deep bouquet of blackberry and dark plum, with developed notes of leather, tobacco, and earthy undertones. On the palate, it is full-bodied, dense, and powerful, with well-integrated tannins and a very long, persistent finish.

title: Alba de Domus

title: Beaujolais Nouveau

title: OrnellaiaLe Volte

title: Cousiño-Macul Lota

title: Tommasi I Pianeti Valpolicella
description: This wine is a quintessential expression of Valpolicella Classico from the renowned Tommasi family, one of the most historic producers in the region. Crafted from the traditional grape blend of Corvinone, Rondinella, and Molinara, it is designed to be fresh, fruity, and approachable. The wine opens with a vibrant bouquet of fresh red fruits, showcasing prominent notes of cherry, raspberry, and strawberry. These bright fruit flavors are complemented by subtle hints of spice, such as licorice and cinnamon, which add a layer of complexity. On the palate, it is light to medium-bodied with bright acidity and smooth tannins, making it a versatile and highly enjoyable wine that is perfect for pairing with a wide variety of dishes.

title: Brancaia Chianti Classico Riserva
description: It has blackberry, blueberry and anise aromas. Upfront, fruit flavors are of luscious, ripe strawberry and blackberry. Further back on the palate it offers a hint of almonds and a rich espresso note toward the finish. The wine ages 16 months in French oak barrels and matures for a few months in the bottle, prior to release.

title: Tenuta CastelGiocondo Brunello di Montalcino
description: Castelgiocondo Brunello is a lively, luminous ruby -red colour with vermillion highlights. The nose offers a melange of berries, among which, blackberry dominates with floral notes of violets. Spicy black pepper and cardamom, followed by fresh notes of juniper, and toasted coffee and hazelnuts. The texture is dense withelegant tannins, full bodied. The finish is very long and warm; spicy notes are joined by equally intense fruity notes.
taste: oak, tobacco, vanilla, chocolate, cedar, coffee, leather, earthy, mushroom, smoke, balsamic, forest floor, cherry, red fruit, raspberry, red cherry, strawberry, sour cherry

title: Antinori Villa Antinori Chianti Classico Riserva
description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.
taste: oak, tobacco, vanilla, chocolate, cedar, clove, cherry, red fruit, raspberry, red cherry, strawberry, sour cherry, leather, earthy, smoke, mushroom, balsamic, minerals, cocoa

title: Scarànto Special Edition Governo All'Uso Toscano Rosso
description: This wine is made using the traditional 'Governo All'Uso Toscano' method, a technique that enriches the Sangiovese grapes' character. A portion of the grapes are dried and added to the fermented wine to initiate a slow, secondary fermentation. This process results in a wine with greater complexity, a smoother texture, and more concentrated fruit flavors. It typically presents intense aromas of ripe red fruits, such as strawberry and cherry, which are beautifully integrated with notes of vanilla, chocolate, and leather from oak aging. A characteristic balsamic note on the finish adds to its depth, creating a rich and velvety Tuscan red.
taste: red fruit, strawberry, oak, chocolate, vanilla, leather, balsamic

title: Castillo Perelada Empordà Grande Reserve Speciale Balduino y Fabiola
description: Intense cherry red color. Complex aroma, with hints of ripe fruit, balsamic and roasted background. The palate is broad, structured and balanced. It has very well integrated tannins and acidity gives much freshness. It is a wine with personality and a long aftertaste.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, caramel, coffee, cedar, plum, black cherry, blackberry, black fruit, blueberry, dark fruit, smoke, leather, earthy, balsamic, bacon fat, flint, graphite, minerals, tar

title: Ruffino Modus Toscana
description: Ruby red colour. Intense and intriguing on the nose, initial aromas of mature red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and small black berries, typical of Sangiovese, are complemented by hints of spices, sweet tobacco, and refined balsamic notes. Full bodied with a modern Super Tuscan style, rich with silky tannins and flavors of mature blackberry fruit and cocoa. Vibrant fresh fruit flavors.
taste: oak, tobacco, vanilla, chocolate, cedar, dark chocolate, blackberry, plum, dark fruit, black cherry, black fruit, blueberry, leather, earthy, smoke, balsamic, cocoa, mushroom

title: Domaine Giboulot Savigny-lès-Beaune Blanc
description: A white Burgundy from the village of Savigny-lès-Beaune, known for producing elegant Chardonnay. The wine expresses notes of green apple, lemon, and white flowers, with a distinct mineral or flinty character derived from limestone-rich soils. Aging in oak adds subtle hints of vanilla and toasted nuts, leading to a complex and well-balanced wine with a crisp, lengthy finish.
taste: apple, lemon, pear, citrus, mineral, flint, oak, vanilla, butter

title: Anciens Temps Blanc
description: Anciens Temps is a Vin de France, allowing for the blending of grapes from different regions. This white blend is crafted to be fresh, fruity, and easy-drinking. It offers a bright aromatic profile of citrus fruits like grapefruit and lemon, along with notes of green apple and white flowers. The palate is light-bodied and crisp with a refreshing acidity, making it a pleasant wine for casual enjoyment.
taste: citrus, grapefruit, lemon, green apple, floral, pear

title: Tenuta Luce Lucente
description: Lucente is the second wine of the renowned Super Tuscan estate, Tenuta Luce. A blend of Merlot and Sangiovese, it is crafted to be more approachable in its youth. The 2019 vintage is noted for its balance and richness, offering a bouquet of ripe blackberries, cherries, and plums, with notes of vanilla, cocoa, and sweet spices from oak aging. The palate is full-bodied and velvety with a long, fruity finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, blackberry, cherry, plum, raspberry, spice

title: Rapaura Springs Reserve
description: The Reserve Sauvignon Blanc from Rapaura Springs showcases the quintessential character of Marlborough with greater intensity. The wine explodes from the glass with powerful aromas of passionfruit, grapefruit, and fresh herbs, with a distinctive mineral note. On the palate, it is concentrated and zesty, with a vibrant acidity that carries the intense fruit flavors to a long and mouth-watering finish.
taste: passionfruit, grapefruit, gooseberry, tropical, grassy, citrus, mineral

title: Albert Bichot Gevrey-Chambertin 'La Justice'
description: From a specific single vineyard 'La Justice' in the prestigious Gevrey-Chambertin village of Burgundy, this Pinot Noir is known for its structure and power. It presents a complex bouquet of dark cherries, blackberries, and earthy, forest floor notes, with hints of licorice and spice from oak aging. The palate is full-bodied and well-structured with firm tannins, suggesting excellent aging potential.
taste: cherry, raspberry, earthy, mushroom, forest floor, oak, spice, leather

title: D'Angelo Canneto
description: Canneto is made from 100% Aglianico, a noble red grape from Southern Italy. This wine is known for its robust character, with aromas of black cherry, plum, and wild berries, complemented by notes of leather, tobacco, and a hint of volcanic earthiness. On the palate, it is full-bodied with firm tannins and a savory, persistent finish, making it an excellent match for hearty meat dishes.
taste: cherry, plum, blackberry, leather, tobacco, earthy, oak, smoke

title: Tenuta Luce Lucente
description: Lucente is the second wine of the renowned Super Tuscan estate, Tenuta Luce. A blend of Merlot and Sangiovese, it is crafted to be more approachable in its youth. It offers a rich bouquet of ripe blackberries, cherries, and plums, with notes of vanilla, cocoa, and sweet spices. The palate is full-bodied and velvety, with soft, well-integrated tannins and a long, fruity finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, blackberry, cherry, plum, raspberry, spice

title: Pounamu Special Selection Sauvignon Blanc
description: This is a classic Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc, a style famous worldwide. It bursts with intense and pungent aromas of passionfruit, guava, and grapefruit, along with signature notes of freshly cut grass and jalapeño. The palate is crisp and vibrant, with a zesty acidity and a long, expressive finish that is both refreshing and full of character.
taste: passionfruit, grapefruit, guava, grassy, tropical, citrus, gooseberry

title: De Stefani Solér Rosso Veneto
description: Solér is a unique red blend from Veneto, crafted using the 'appassimento' technique where grapes are partially dried. This process concentrates the flavors, resulting in a rich, full-bodied wine. It offers intense aromas of ripe cherry jam and plum, with notes of spice, chocolate, and vanilla from oak aging. The palate is powerful yet smooth, with soft tannins and a long, warm finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, jam, plum, cherry, blackberry, raspberry, spice

title: La Rioja Alta Viña Alberdi Reserva
description: Viña Alberdi is a classic Rioja Reserva from one of the region's most respected producers. Made from 100% Tempranillo and aged for two years in American oak, it displays a characteristic bouquet of ripe red fruits, vanilla, coconut, and sweet spice. On the palate, it is medium-bodied with a smooth texture and well-integrated tannins, embodying the elegant, traditional style of Rioja.
taste: oak, vanilla, coconut, tobacco, leather, cherry, raspberry, strawberry, plum

title: Bodegas Juan Gil (Silver Label) Monastrell
description: The 'Silver Label' from Juan Gil is made from old Monastrell vines and aged for 12 months in French oak barrels. It is a step up in complexity from the yellow label, offering intense aromas of ripe blackberries and plums, integrated with notes of toasted oak, cocoa, and coffee. The palate is powerful, full-bodied, and rich, with well-rounded tannins and a long, elegant finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, coffee, smoke, blackberry, plum, dark fruit, blueberry, spice

title: Kendall-Jackson Vintner's Reserve Chardonnay
description: One of America's most popular Chardonnays, known for its rich, buttery, and fruit-forward style. It's aged in French and American oak barrels, exhibiting lush tropical fruit flavors of pineapple and mango, alongside notes of vanilla, honey, and toasted oak. A creamy texture is balanced by a hint of acidity, leading to a smooth finish.
taste: oak, butter, vanilla, tropical, pineapple, mango, pear, apple, honey

title: Viña San Pedro Sideral
variety: Blend (Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Carmenere, Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot)
description: From the historic Vina San Pedro estate, established in 1865. This Sideral comes from their high-elevation vineyards in the Cachapoal Andes Valley. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Carmenere, Petit Verdot, and Cabernet Franc, it's packed with dark berries, notes of chocolate, cedar, cassis, and plum. Juicy and fresh on the tongue, more dark fruits weave around a core of fine-grained tannins leading into a long smooth finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, leather, smoke, blackberry, cassis, plum, pepper, tobacco

title: Tenuta San Guido Guidalberto
description: As the second wine of the iconic 'Sassicaia', Guidalberto is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. First produced in 2000, it is designed to be enjoyed earlier than its famous sibling. The wine showcases vibrant fruit and elegant structure, reflecting the unique terroir of Bolgheri. Aromas of cherry, blueberry, earth, and tobacco with hints of violets. Full-bodied with a smooth texture and great length.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, tobacco, earthy, blackberry, plum, cherry, cassis, blackcurrant

title: Sterling Vineyards Vintner's Collection Merlot
description: The Sterling Vintner's Collection Merlot boasts vivid aromas of fresh mixed-berry jam, red cherry, milk chocolate, and baked spice. The wine is round and with good weight and generous flavors of blackberry bramble, sweet toasted oak, and mocha. The wine is full-bodied with great concentration, silky tannins, and a lengthy finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, blackberry, plum, cherry, raspberry, mocha

title: Bodegas Salentein Barrel Selection Chardonnay
description: The Salentein Barrel Selection Chardonnay is a pure varietal Chardonnay matured for 6 months in oak casks. It offers a wonderfully rich bouquet with aromas of pears, apples, cloves, and tropical fruit like honeydew melon. On the palate, the wine is soft and full-bodied, with a lovely melt. The subtle hints of tropical fruit are underpinned by discreet notes of oak, balanced by a lovely acidity.
taste: oak, butter, vanilla, tropical, pineapple, pear, apple, citrus, honey

title: VIK Milla Cala Red Blend
variety: Blend (Cabernet Sauvignon, Carmenere, Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Syrah)
description: Milla Cala is the second wine of the prestigious VIK winery in Chile. It is a Bordeaux-style blend that reflects the unique terroir of Millahue, the 'Place of Gold'. The wine is aged in French oak barrels, which contributes to its complexity and structure. It offers a rich palate of red and black fruits, such as raspberry and plum, complemented by notes of spice, tobacco, and chocolate with elegant, firm tannins.
taste: oak, chocolate, tobacco, vanilla, leather, plum, blackberry, raspberry, cherry, cassis

title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Named after the Greek goddess of the hunt, Artemis is a classic Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon from one of its most renowned producers. It is known for its inviting aromas of ripe raspberry, dark cherry, and blackberry, layered with hints of cedar, spice, and vanilla. On the palate, it is full-bodied and expressive with a rich texture, supple tannins, and a long, lingering finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, tobacco, leather, blackberry, cassis, plum, cherry, dark fruit

title: Pazo Cilleiro Albariño
description: Pazo Cilleiro is an Albariño from the Rías Baixas region in northwestern Spain, an area renowned for this grape. This wine is celebrated for its freshness and aromatic intensity. It displays vibrant citrus notes of grapefruit and lime, along with stone fruit like apricot and a distinct saline or mineral character. The palate is crisp and dry, with a zesty acidity that makes it incredibly refreshing.
taste: citrus, grapefruit, lime, green apple, stone fruit, apricot, mineral, saline

title: Bodegas Juan Gil (Yellow Label) Monastrell
description: This wine is made from 100% Monastrell grapes from old vines in the Jumilla region of Spain. Aged for 4 months in French oak, it is known for its deep color and powerful aromas. It offers an intense bouquet of ripe blackberry, blueberry, and plum, with toasted notes of coffee, cocoa, and spice from the oak. The palate is rich, full-bodied, and well-structured with a long, savory finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, smoke, blackberry, plum, dark fruit, blueberry, cherry, pepper

title: Marchesi Antinori Tenuta Tignanello Chianti Classico Riserva
description: Produced by the historic Antinori family at their Tignanello estate, this Chianti Classico Riserva is predominantly Sangiovese. Aged in oak barrels, it's a wine of great elegance and complexity, showing intense aromas of red fruits like cherry and raspberry, along with notes of licorice, vanilla, and spice. The palate is full-bodied and supple with velvety tannins and a long, savory finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, tobacco, leather, cherry, raspberry, plum, earthy, strawberry

title: Feudo Arancio Dalila Riserva
description: Dalila is an intriguing white blend from Sicily, combining the native Grillo grape with aromatic Viognier. A portion of the wine is fermented in oak barrels, adding complexity. It presents a bouquet of ripe tropical fruits, peach, and apricot, with hints of vanilla and wildflowers. The palate is rich and full-bodied yet balanced by a refreshing acidity, leading to a persistent and aromatic finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, butter, tropical, pineapple, mango, peach, apricot, citrus

title: Viña Vistamar Reserva Merlot
description: This Merlot Reserva from Chile's Maule Valley is known for being soft, fruity, and approachable. It is aged for a short period in oak to add subtle complexity. The wine displays aromas of ripe red fruits like plums and cherries, mixed with notes of black pepper, chocolate, and a hint of vanilla. On the palate, it is medium-bodied with soft, rounded tannins and a pleasant, fruity finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, plum, cherry, blackberry, raspberry, pepper

title: Redtree Chardonnay
description: Redtree Chardonnay is a fruit-forward, crowd-pleasing wine from California. It aims for a clean and refreshing style, opening with aromas of green apple, pear, and citrus, with a touch of tropical fruit and vanilla. The palate is bright and crisp, with a medium body and a smooth finish, making it a versatile wine for pairing with a variety of dishes or enjoying on its own.
taste: apple, pear, citrus, tropical, pineapple, vanilla, butter

title: Château Tour d'Auron
description: Château Tour d'Auron is a classic Bordeaux red from the Entre-Deux-Mers region. It typically presents a blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, offering straightforward and approachable fruit flavors. Expect aromas of red fruits like cherry and plum with some earthy and spicy undertones. On the palate, it is medium-bodied with smooth tannins, making it an easy-drinking wine suitable for everyday meals.
taste: cherry, plum, earthy, blackberry, cassis, oak, tobacco

title: Château Valandraud 'Symphony No. 3 Eroica'
description: A special bottling from one of Saint-Émilion's most famous "garage wine" producers. The 2012 vintage is characterized by its opulence and concentration, revealing complex aromas of black cherries, truffle, licorice, and smoke, with hints of chocolate and espresso. The palate is full-bodied, dense, and layered, with ripe, velvety tannins and a remarkably long finish. This edition celebrated Beethoven's 250th anniversary.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, tobacco, leather, truffle, blackberry, cherry, plum, cassis

title: Domaine Octavie Touraine Sauvignon Blanc
description: This is a classic Sauvignon Blanc from the Touraine appellation in France's Loire Valley. The wine bursts with vibrant notes of gooseberry, grapefruit, and fresh-cut grass, with a distinct flinty mineral character. On the palate, it is light-bodied, crisp, and dry, with a zesty acidity and a clean, refreshing finish, making it a quintessential example of the grape from its homeland.
taste: grapefruit, gooseberry, citrus, green apple, grassy, mineral, flint

title: Casa Marin Cipreses Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc
description: From the cool-climate, coastal San Antonio Valley in Chile, this is one of the country's benchmark white wines. It is intensely aromatic, showcasing pungent notes of green bell pepper and citrus zest, combined with a saline, stony minerality. The palate is bone-dry and electric, with a sharp, piercing acidity and a long, savory finish. (Note: Vintage not fully visible, 2022 used as a recent example).
taste: grapefruit, gooseberry, citrus, lime, bell pepper, grassy, mineral, saline

title: Louis Jadot Bourgogne
description: A benchmark for the category, this Pinot Noir is sourced from various vineyards across Burgundy. It is aged in French oak barrels, which adds a subtle spice note. The wine exhibits classic Burgundy aromas of fresh red fruits like cherry and raspberry, with earthy undertones and a hint of spice. It's medium-bodied with silky tannins and a fresh, elegant finish, representing great value and typicity.
taste: cherry, raspberry, earthy, cranberry, strawberry, oak, spice

title: Louis Latour Bourgogne
description: From another iconic Burgundy producer, this wine is known for its consistent quality. It is fermented in stainless steel and aged in oak barrels. The wine displays a bouquet of bright red fruits, such as cherry and redcurrant, complemented by earthy notes and a touch of black pepper. The palate is light to medium-bodied with supple tannins and a crisp, refreshing finish.
taste: cherry, raspberry, redcurrant, earthy, pepper, spice

title: Ménage à Trois Bourbon Barrel Aged
description: This Californian Cabernet Sauvignon is aged for three months in Bourbon barrels, which imparts unique and bold flavors. The result is a wine with intense aromas of ripe blackberry, dark cherry, and vanilla, layered with notes of caramel, toasted oak, and a hint of smokiness from the bourbon barrels. It is full-bodied and rich on the palate with a smooth, lingering finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, chocolate, caramel, smoke, blackberry, dark fruit, cherry

title: Thörle Saulheim Spätburgunder Kalkstein
description: Spätburgunder is the German name for Pinot Noir, and this example comes from the limestone (Kalkstein) soils of Rheinhessen. This terroir imparts a distinct minerality to the wine. It offers elegant aromas of sour cherry, raspberry, and wild strawberry, with subtle notes of spice and earth. The palate is light-bodied and precise, with a fine tannic structure, vibrant acidity, and a long, mineral-driven finish.
taste: cherry, raspberry, strawberry, earthy, mineral, spice, cranberry

title:
Ménage à Trois 
Bourbon Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon
description: This Californian Cabernet Sauvignon is aged for at least three months in Bourbon barrels, a technique that imparts unique and bold flavors. The wine is full-bodied and rich, bursting with aromas of ripe blackberry, dark cherry, and plum. These fruit notes are layered with distinct hints of caramel, vanilla, and toasted, smoky oak derived from the bourbon barrel aging, leading to a smooth and robust finish.
taste: oak, vanilla, caramel, blackberry, blueberry, smoke, leather, cherrry, pepper, brown sugar, cream

title:
Félix Solís 
The Guv’nor
description: Enjoy this fruity red, revel in the smooth oaky vanilla and be satisfied by the rich aromas.
taste: vanilla, oak, chocolate, blackberry, plum, blackcurrant, dark fruit, cherry, red fruit, strawberry, leather, pepper, cheese, citrus

title:
Casa Rojo 
Las Viñas Bastardas
description: From the innovative Spanish producer Casa Rojo, this is a creative and modern red blend. Crafted from Syrah, Monastrell, and Grenache grown in southeastern Spain, the wine is powerful and expressive. It offers intense aromas of ripe black fruits like blackberry and plum, with notes of raspberry, black pepper, and licorice. The palate is full-bodied and well-structured with ripe tannins and a long, spicy finish.
taste: bluberry, blackberry, oak, vanilla, strawberry, leather, pepper

title:
Yellow Tail 
Shiraz
description: Shiraz is created with a simple philosophy in mind - to make a great wine that everyone can enjoy anytime in any place. Enjoy this wine with a bunch of friends and a hearty BBQ steak.
taste: vanilla, oak, chocolate, plum, blackberry, dark fruit, jam, blackcurrant, cherry, red fruit, raspberry, strawberry, pepper, licorice, smoke, leather, cheese

title:
Grant Burge Wines 
Barossa Ink Shiraz
description: Deep purple, with a blue / purple hue. Rich aromas of plums, raspberries, dark chocolate and blueberry jam with underlying mint and cinnamon. The dense, rich, full bodied wine has a sensual palate offering plenty of texture, fine velvet tannins and soft, round dark fruit flavours, complimented by dark chocolate ice.
taste: plum, blackberry, dark fruit, blackcurrant, chocolate, vanilla, oak, cherry, raspberry, pepper, leather
